item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:8, topic:244039”]What did he want? He posted that code, so i edited it. You’re the idiot.[/quote]That only sends a message that the person is owner, when it doesn’t assign rights. It’s not your fault it isn’t there…

item.title: How do i make from 1 owner to 2 owners
item.dc:creator: @Kalphiter Kalphiter
item.description:
@Kalphiter wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:6, topic:244039”] if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("HIS USERNAME HERE")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } [/quote]

Idiot.

That only sends a message.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2008, 05:00:52 pm[/size][hr]if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper")|| playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("The Reaper")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Server Owner " +playerName+ " has logged in"; }
